### Missing: annotations.config.title=Annotations configuration panel ### Missing: annotations.config.display.title=Annotation display ### Missing: annotations.config.type.title=Annotation type ### Missing: annotations.config.activate.title=Annotation activation ### Missing: annotations.config.activate.explanation=The following two settings allow you to configure which locations annotations are active in. The first setting specifies the general rule, while the second list specifies the locations for which the rule shouldn't apply. For example, activated "yes" and exception locations "XWiki" and "Main" means that annotations will be active on all locations except for "XWiki" and "Main". As an opposite example, using activated "no" and exception locations "Documents" means that annotations will be active only for the "Documents" location. ### Missing: annotations.config.type.explanation=Add properties to this class if you want extra properties for your annotations. admin.annotations=Notities ### Missing: admin.annotations.description=Configure the page annotations
### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_activated=Annotations are activated ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_activated.hint=Decide if annotations are active on the wiki ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_exceptionSpaces=Except for the following locations ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_exceptionSpaces.hint=Deactivate annotations for the following subset of locations: ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_displayed=Display annotations by default ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_displayed.hint=Decide if annotations are displayed by default or only when "Show annotations" is checked on each page ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_displayHighlight=Highlight annotations by default ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_displayHighlight.hint=Decide if highlighting of an annotation should be displayed always or only when hovering over an annotation or a structure of annotations ### Missing: AnnotationCode.AnnotationConfig_annotationClass=XWiki class defining annotations structure
